summary: Frontend testing completed for SIGESC turma display standardization. All pages verified to show only class name (without série/etapa and turno). All 6 pages tested passed successfully.

issues: WebSocket connection warnings in console (non-blocking, cosmetic issue)

context_for_next_testing_agent: All turma display standardization changes verified. Pages tested: /admin/classes (table columns), /admin/students (turma column), /admin/grades (turma dropdown), /admin/attendance (turma dropdown), /admin/promotion (turma dropdown), /admin/schools (turmas tab in modal). All show only class name without série/etapa or turno info.

classes_page.details: Table shows only Turma, Escola, Ano Letivo, Ações columns. Série/Etapa and Turno columns removed.

students_page.details: Turma column shows only class name (e.g., '1º Ano A') without série/turno info.

grades_page.details: Turma dropdown shows only class names: '1º Ano A', '2º Ano A', etc.

attendance_page.details: Turma dropdown shows only class names: '1º Ano A', '2º Ano A', etc.

promotion_page.details: Turma dropdown shows only class names: '3º Ano A', '4º Ano A', etc.

schools_page_turmas_tab.details: Turmas tab in school modal shows only Turma and Ano Letivo columns. Class names displayed correctly.
